enum clpp::value_semantic

Value semantic types (for check).

Enumerator:
no_semantic  Default value.
path  Path semantic check.
ipv4  IPv4 semantic check.
ipv6  IPv6 semantic check.
ip  IP semantic check.
email  E-mail semantic check.
